document.full_text: pakistani troops and paramilitary forces, backed by helicopter gunships and warplanes, targeted taliban positions in the tribal region of mohmand near the afghan border on thursday, killing at least 18 militants, a regional government official said.
document.title: pakistan forces attack taliban hideouts, kill 18
lines_and_colors: pakistani troops and paramilitary forces, backed by helicopter gunships and warplanes, targeted taliban positions in the tribal region of mohmand near the afghan border on thursday, killing at least 18 militants, a regional government official said.
